name: Battlezone 98 Redux: Odyssey Edition
storyline: Enter an alternate vision of the 1960s where the “space race” is nothing more than a cover for an interplanetary war between the US and Soviet Russia over mysterious alien bio-metal.
summary: Battlezone 98 Redux delivers one of the greatest sci-fi strategy games of all time with remastered visuals, mods support and online multiplayer. This “Odyssey Edition” completes the package with the inclusion of The Red Odyssey expansion featuring additional playable factions, campaigns, vehicles and more!
